--- In gladiator@y..., "dancing corpse" <dancing_corpse@h...> wrote:
> hoping this won't be a fight, just a debate...

Trust me, the first sign of flames {emphasis: plural) will result in 
some action being taken (you sure don't want to know all the available 
tricks a moderator has for yahoo groups.).

**Pet Peave/Nettique*
One more thing that is becoming annoying:  How you guys respond to 
replies.  Please leave a blank line after you finishing a line or make 
it obvious where the quote ends and your opinion begins.  Just because 
you're responding to a message does not mean you have to quote the 
entire message.  Just keep the parts you are responding to and leave 
out the rest.

Congrats, we've just tripled our previous record for number of 
messages posted in a month and the number of messages posted this 
month is greater than the total number of messages posted in the 
previous 6 months.
